Remove year numbers from the end of field names

Source: R/fix_old_year_suffixes.R
fix_old_year_suffixes.Rd

Older shapefiles from the census (pre-2010) have the last two digits of the year appended to the ends of their fields. This function removes all trailing digits from each field name.

Usage

fix_old_year_suffixes(.features)

Arguments

.features

a tibble

Value

the same tibble, but with some fields possibly renamed.

Examples

data.frame(
  LoveIs0 = c("Amor", "Amour", "Amore")
) |> fix_old_year_suffixes()
#>   LoveIs
#> 1   Amor
#> 2  Amour
#> 3  Amore
